TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlPipe extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许托管存储过程在 SQL Server 数据库上进行进程内运行，以便将结果返回调用方。

span.span: Allows managed stored procedures running in-process on a SQL Server database to return results back to the caller.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例将提供给被管理的存储过程，通过属性类。An instance of this class is made available to managed stored procedures through the property of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例使用和来从存储过程中的数据源选择的行。The following example uses and to select rows from a data source in a stored procedure. 然后该示例使用执行命令并将结果发送回客户端。The example then uses a to execute the command and send the results back to the client. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteAndSend(class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand command) cil managed

span.span: The object to be executed.

summary.span: 执行作为参数传递的命令，并将结果发送到客户端。

span.span: Executes the command passed as a parameter and sends the results to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了任何实际的结果，其他消息和错误是还直接发送到客户端。In addition to any actual results, other messages and errors are also sent directly to the client. 输出参数和返回值不会发送到客户端;这些是用于调用方，通过命令对象的 parameters 集合。Output parameters and return values are not sent to the client; these are available to the caller, through the parameters collection of the command object. 如果该命令未绑定到的进程内连接，引发。If the command is not bound to an in-process connection, an is thrown. 对于绑定到进程外连接的命令，此方法不受支持。This method is not supported on commands bound to out-of-process connections. 如果中有错误异常发送到的命名管道，但副本也会发送给调用托管代码已提交的对象。If there are errors in the object that was submitted, exceptions are sent to the pipe, but a copy is also sent to calling managed code. 如果调用的代码不会捕获异常，将 Transact SQL 代码在堆栈中向上传播并在输出中出现两次。If the calling code doesn't catch the exception, it will propagate up the stack to the Transact-SQL code and appear in the output twice. 如果调用代码捕获了异常，则管道使用者仍会看到以下错误，但不是会重复错误。If the calling code does catch the exception, the pipe consumer will still see the error, but there will not be a duplicate error. ## Examples 下面的示例使用和来从存储过程中的数据源选择的行。The following example uses and to select rows from a data source in a stored procedure. 然后该示例使用执行命令并将结果发送回客户端。The example then uses a to execute the command and send the results back to the client. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 对于绑定到进程外连接的命令，此方法不受支持。

span.span: This method is not supported on commands bound to out-of-process connections.

public: property bool IsSendingResults { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否处于将单个结果集发送回客户端的模式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is in the mode of sending single result sets back to the client.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果已调用 方法，并且 处于将单个结果集发送回客户端的模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method has been called and the is in the mode of sending single result sets back to the client; otherwise .

summary.span: 将结果直接发送到客户端或当前输出使用者。

span.span: Sends results directly to the client or current output consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **发送**方法数据将直接发送到客户端或调用方。The **Send** method sends data straight to the client or caller. 它通常是客户端使用的输出**管道**方法，但对于嵌套的 CLR 存储的过程输出使用者还可以是存储的过程。It is usually the client that consumes the output from the **Pipe** method, but in the case of nested CLR stored procedures the output consumer can also be a stored procedure. 例如，Procedure1 调用具有命令文本"EXEC 过程 2"。For example, Procedure1 calls with the command text "EXEC Procedure2". 过程 2 也是托管的存储的过程。Procedure2 is also a managed stored procedure. 如果过程 2 现在调用，将行发送到 Procedure1 的读取器，不向客户端。If Procedure2 now calls , the row is sent to Procedure1's reader, not to the client.

summary.span: 将多行结果集直接发送到客户端或当前输出使用者。

span.span: Sends a multirow result set directly to the client or current output consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果作为一个参数具有隐藏列传入的对象，这些列不会传播到结果集发送到客户端。If the object passed in as a parameter has hidden columns, those columns are not propagated to the result set sent to the client.

span.span: The is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Send(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 要发送到客户端的消息字符串。

span.span: The message string to be sent to the client.

summary.span: 将字符串消息直接发送到客户端或当前输出使用者。

span.span: Sends a string message directly to the client or current output consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为一条信息性消息情况下，消息字符串发送到客户端。The message string is sent as an informational message to the client. 客户端应用程序可通过不同的机制，具体取决于数据访问应用程序编程接口 (API)，它们使用侦听消息。Client applications can listen to messages through different mechanisms, depending on the data access application programming interface (API) that they use. 例如，如果客户端正在使用 ADO.NET，消息传输通过事件。For example, if the client is using ADO.NET, the messages transmit through the event. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法直接向客户端发送的消息字符串。The following example uses the method to send a message string directly to the client. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.Send#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.Send/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.Send#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.Send/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The is greater than 4,000 characters.
The is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SendResultsEnd() cil managed

summary.span: 标记结果集的结尾，并将 实例返回到初始状态。

span.span: Marks the end of a result set, and returns the instance back to the initial state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管的存储的过程可以将结果集发送到客户端不实现。Managed stored procedures can send result sets to clients that are not implementing a . 此方法，以及和，允许要发送到客户端的自定义结果集的存储的过程。This method, along with and , allow stored procedures to send custom result sets to the client. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新及其。The following example creates a new and its . 该示例然后标记的一个结果集，使用开始方法，将使用示例数据的记录发送回客户端使用方法，并标记的末尾结果集与方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The method was not previously called.

param.name: record
param.span: 对象，它具有要发送到客户端的行的列值。

span.span: A object with the column values for the row to be sent to the client.

param.span: 记录的架构必须与传递给 方法的 的元数据所描述的架构相匹配。

span.span: The schema for the record must match the schema described by the metadata of the passed to the method.

summary.span: 将单行数据发送回客户端。

span.span: Sends a single row of data back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管的存储的过程可以将结果集发送到客户端不实现。Managed stored procedures can send result sets to clients that are not implementing a . 此方法，以及和，允许要发送到客户端的自定义结果集的存储的过程。This method, along with and , allows stored procedures to send custom result sets to the client. 方法可发送回客户端数据的单个行。The method sends a single row of data back to the client. 行可以连续地返回给调用方通过调用、 一次发送每个行。Rows can subsequently be returned to the caller by calling , one time for each row being sent. 已发送的所有行，对的调用后方法仍要求标记结果集的末尾。After all the rows have been sent, a call to the method is required to mark the end of the result set. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新及其。The following example creates a new and its . 该示例然后标记的一个结果集，使用开始方法，将使用示例数据的记录发送回客户端使用方法，并标记的末尾结果集与方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SendResultsStart(class Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord record) cil managed

param.name: record
param.span: 对象，元数据即是从中提取并用来描述结果集的。

span.span: A object from which metadata is extracted and used to describe the result set.

summary.span: 标记要发送到客户端的结果集的开始，并使用记录参数构造描述结果集的元数据。

span.span: Marks the beginning of a result set to be sent back to the client, and uses the record parameter to construct the metadata that describes the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管的存储的过程可以将结果集发送到客户端不实现。Managed stored procedures can send result sets to clients that are not implementing a . 此方法，以及和，允许要发送到客户端的自定义结果集的存储的过程。This method, along with and , allow stored procedures to send custom result sets to the client. 方法标记的一个结果集，开始，并使用记录的参数来构造描述结果集的元数据。The method marks the beginning of a result set, and uses the record parameter to construct the metadata that describes the result set. 所有后续的行，使用发送方法，必须与该元数据定义匹配。All the subsequent rows, sent using the method, must match that metadata definition. 请注意，之后调用，则只和可以调用。Note that after calling , only and can be called. 中的同一个实例的任何其他方法引发。Any other method in the same instance of throws an . 设置回中可以调用其他方法的初始状态。 sets back to the initial state where other methods can be called. 控制权将返回给 TRANSACT-SQL 从 CLR 执行后，不尝试使用静态或本地变量初始化为 CLR 内存。After control returns to Transact-SQL from CLR execution, do not attempt to use a static or local variable initialized to CLR memory. 例如，是否存储在进程的实例类，例如`SQLDataRecord`，控制从 CLR 返回之后将使用它。For example, do not store an instance of an in process class, for example `SQLDataRecord`, which will be used after control returns from CLR. 一个例外是`SQLMetaData`进程类中。One exception is the `SQLMetaData` in process class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新及其。The following example creates a new and its . 该示例然后标记的一个结果集，使用开始方法，将使用示例数据的记录发送回客户端使用方法，并标记的末尾结果集与方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart/VB/source.vb#1)]
